data.message: Em has always commented on political issues so why is it an issue now? Chances are if you are just now realizing em is political then you were just a casual fan to begin with and you wont be missed. Im sure em wont lose any sleep at night.  Eminem is officially the goat. Suck on that trump supporters!#goat

replies.message: Its a big deal now because he openely spat on his fans... Hes never crossed the line before. No conservative that listened to eminem, before, cared about his personal political beliefs cuz hes still the greatest rapper but to openly insult your fans and i quote "fuck you" to trump supporters is obviously dofferent. Lol everyone knows eminem is political
He has openly done that before. Remember the way i am? This is nothing new
